mapper.update:
update tbl_customer
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_customer set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer(id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address) values (#{customer.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.editTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.nextContactTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select customer.id, user1.name as owner, customer.name, customer.website, customer.phone, customer.create_by, customer.create_time, customer.edit_by, customer.edit_time, customer.contact_summary, customer.next_contact_time, customer.description, customer.address from tbl_customer customer join tbl_user user1 on user1.id=customer.owner
customer.name like concat('%',#{map.owner},'%')
and customer.name like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
and customer.website like concat('%',#{map.website},'%')
and customer.phone like concat('%',#{map.phone},'%')
order by customer.create_time desc

select count(customer.id) from tbl_customer customer join tbl_user user1 on user1.id=customer.owner
customer.name like concat('%',#{map.owner},'%')
and customer.name like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
and customer.website like concat('%',#{map.website},'%')
and customer.phone like concat('%',#{map.phone},'%')
